LanguageData.Leather_WoWNightElf.label: night elf leather
LanguageData.Leather_WoWNightElf.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Night Elf skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
LanguageData.Leather_WoWBloodElf.label: blood elf leather
LanguageData.Leather_WoWBloodElf.description: Tanned, dried, scraped Blood Elf skin. Most people find this material horrifying. Some find it fascinating. While a decent leather, it neither protects nor insulates particularly well.
